index_t  rank 
)

Get a block (start, end) to work on in the range (lo, hi) for process rank.

Parameters:
world communicator.
lo lower end of the range.
hi higher end of the range.
start first index to work on.
end last index to work on.
rank process to get work for.
Returns:
Whether any work is available for process rank.

real  y 
)

Calculate a point in the mandelbrot set.

Parameters:

Returns:

Calculates a power of 2.

Parameters:
